original: Malmöh. 1., av landshövd. greve Gotth. W. o. frih :an Elisabeth von Essen. G. 00 m. Greta Lindström. Barn: Eva f. 00, d. 47, Carl Johan 03, Hans 12. — Studiex. i Sthim 90, und:-löjtn. v. Göta art:reg. 93, löjtn. 98, kapten 04, major v. Smål. art :reg. 16, överstelöjtn. v. Göta art:reg. 22. RSO, RNO, RVO, KFinlVRO. , Hans Wilhehn, Axelsson, civil jägmästare, greve, Karlskrona, f. 25/12/13 i Lidingö av ryttmäst. greve .Ajcel W. o. Caroda von Eckermann. G. 38 m. Ingrid Tobieson. Barn: Hans f. 40, Wilhelm 42, Gabriel 43, Agneta 46. — Stud:ex. i Karlskr. 3il, utex. fr. skoigsliögsk. 38, fänr. i Livreg. gren. res. 35, kapten 45. Bitr. mil:-attaché v. leg. i Paris 38, bränsle-chef i Blek. 1. 45-46, jordbr :förv. v. Jo-hannishus fideikommiss fr. 46. Off-TunNI, Karlskr. svfl GM, 2 SkytteM, SkytiteRM.
translated:
Malmöh. 1., son of provincial governor Count Gotth. W. and Baroness Elisabeth von Essen. Married to Greta Lindström in the year 1900. Children: Eva born in 1900, died in 1947, Carl Johan born in 1903, Hans born in 1912. Graduated from the University of Stockholm in 1890, second lieutenant in the Gotha Artillery Regiment in 1893, lieutenant in 1898, captain in 1904, major in the Småland Artillery Regiment in 1916, lieutenant colonel in the Gotha Artillery Regiment in 1922. Decorated with the Royal Order of the Seraphim (RSO), the Royal Order of the North Star (RNO), the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO), and the Knight of the Finnish White Rose Order (KFinlVRO).

Hans Wilhelm Axelsson, civil forester, count, born on December 25, 1913, in Lidingö, son of cavalry captain Count Axel W. and Caroda von Eckermann. Married to Ingrid Tobieson in 1938. Children: Hans born in 1940, Wilhelm born in 1942, Gabriel born in 1943, Agneta born in 1946. Graduated from the Royal Naval Academy in Karlskrona in 1933, graduated from the Forestry School in 1938, ensign in the Life Grenadier Regiment Reserve in 1935, captain in 1945. Assistant military attaché at the Swedish Legation in Paris in 1938, fuel chief in Blekinge County from 1945-1946, agricultural supervisor of the Johannishus Estate from 1946. Officer of the Order of the Sword (Off-TunNI), Karlskrona Naval Society Gold Medal (Karlskr. svfl GM), recipient of the 2nd Class Skytte Medal (2 SkytteM), recipient of the Skytte Medal in Gold (SkytiteRM).
